game_description: Pickup Basketball VR is a multiplayer VR game that lets up to 4 players play in various game modes including 1v1, 2v2, Horse and 3-point contest. Pickup Basketball VR allows players to compete online with or against friends and players from across the world. This basketball game is an immersive sports gaming experience like never-before utilizing the technology of VR. Pickup Basketball VR utilizes unique technology in allowing for a never-before experienced simulation of basketball featuring: - Realistic controls that involve dribbling, shooting, passing that brings you the feel of a true basketball game - Multiplayer mode where you can play other players online and test your skills in full play pick up games - Different court options including playground, gym, skyrise and more. - Customize your player avatar with a variety of options including face, skin tone, hair, jersey and other accessories
review_3: It is fun but it actually very buggy, when playing a one on one and you rebound and dribble they call a thing on you, and you actually don’t shoot realistically, you just push your hand out and it goes flying across the court, or when you block someone it just flys into the wall. I’ve also had cases of falling out of the map and having to relaunch the game to fix it. If they fix the bugs and spice up the game it would be good..
review_4: If your game won’t load. Make sure you have an updated headset. Uninstall and then reinstall. Make sure you allow permissions. Should work then.
review_5: one thing for the game add some more maps and when we go to peoples private server its very buggy to shoot in the game and fix the ai to anyways thats all i got peace.
